character.age: 25 years old, with a hint of agelessness due to her connection to the mystical realm.
character.role: Mysterious Adventurer and Seeker of Lost Knowledge
character.background: Eira hails from a lineage of esteemed scholars, who for generations have delved into the mysteries of the arcane. As a child, she demonstrated an uncanny affinity for magic, often causing unintended but fascinating occurrences whenever she attempted to learn even simple spells.
character.place-of-birth: Greenhaven, a hidden valley nestled within a labyrinthine mountain range where ancient forests and primeval ruins whisper secrets to those who dare listen.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Azure with flecks of sapphire that seem to shimmer in the right light
physical-appearance.hair-color: Rich, dark chestnut with subtle undertones of auburn and hints of an otherworldly glow when under magical influence
